description: This file defines the main React application component 'App', which manages layout and theme toggling, and composes other components like Navbar, Hero, Footer, and an environment badge. It handles dark mode using Tailwind CSS classes and includes external component and utility imports.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component that manages dark mode state and renders layout with Navbar, Hero, Footer, and EnvBadge components. Implements theme toggling via useState and useEffect hooks.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Callback function that toggles the dark mode state, used by Navbar to switch themes.
